title: Auxiliary Board 45th Anniversary Celebration
description:
Join the Auxiliary Board to celebrate 45 years of supporting the Art Institute’s acquisitions, exhibitions, and special projects. Toast the board’s legacy of partnership at a cocktail reception, enjoy dinner in Terzo Piano, and dance the night away at the after party in Griffin Court. Proceeds benefit the Art Institute.

6:30 Reception and Dinner
9:00 After-Party

Cocktail Attire

For more information, please contact Roberta Neuhausler at rneuha@artic.edu or (312)443-3674.
